mapper.sql: Bid, Busername, Bpassword, Bname, Baddress, Btime, Bservice, Bphoto, Bjob, Bother
mapper.insert: insert into business (Bid, Busername, Bpassword, Bname, Baddress, Btime, Bservice, Bphoto, Bjob, Bother) values (#{bid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{busername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{btime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bservice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bother,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update business
Busername = #{busername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Bpassword = #{bpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Bname = #{bname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Baddress = #{baddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Btime = #{btime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Bservice = #{bservice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Bphoto = #{bphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Bjob = #{bjob,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Bother = #{bother,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Bid = #{bid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update business set Busername = #{busername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Bpassword = #{bpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Bname = #{bname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Baddress = #{baddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Btime = #{btime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Bservice = #{bservice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Bphoto = #{bphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Bjob = #{bjob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Bother = #{bother,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Bid = #{bid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from talent,experience where talent.Tid=experience.Tid and experience.Bid=#{bid}
